name: Mem0 Memory
description: Persistent conversational memory via Mem0. Auto-captures context after each agent turn and auto-recalls relevant memories before responding.

apiKey.description: Mem0 API key for authenticating with the memory service.

host.description: Mem0 API host URL. Defaults to https://api.mem0.ai â€” set this to your self-hosted instance URL.

userId.description: User ID for scoping memories. Defaults to "default". Use a unique ID per org or instance to isolate memories.

autoCapture.description: Automatically store conversation context after each agent turn. Defaults to true.

autoRecall.description: Automatically inject relevant memories into context before each agent turn. Defaults to true.

apiKey.label: Mem0 API Key
apiKey.help: API key for the Mem0 service. Supports ${MEM0_API_KEY} env var syntax.

userId.label: User ID
userId.help: Scopes memories to this user. Use org-slug or instance-name for isolation.

autoCapture.label: Auto-Capture
autoCapture.help: Automatically store conversation context after each agent turn.

autoRecall.label: Auto-Recall
autoRecall.help: Automatically inject relevant memories before each agent turn.
